alert.note: Alert for Northern Monterey Bay; Northern Salinas Valley, Hollister Valley and Carmel Valley; Southern Monterey Bay and Big Sur Coast; Southern Salinas Valley, Arroyo Seco and Lake San Antonio (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued October 05 at 5:01AM PDT until October 05 at 9:00AM PDT by NWS Monterey
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM PDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Visibility one quarter mile or less in dense fog. * WHERE...Southern Salinas Valley, Arroyo Seco, and Lake San Antonio, Northern Salinas Valley, Hollister Valley, and Carmel Valley, Northern Monterey Bay and Southern Monterey Bay and Big Sur Coast. * WHEN...Until 9 AM PDT this morning. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.

area.areaDesc: Northern Monterey Bay; Northern Salinas Valley, Hollister Valley and Carmel Valley; Southern Monterey Bay and Big Sur Coast; Southern Salinas Valley, Arroyo Seco and Lake San Antonio
